Body: Description: How to create an alert for changed rights for devices?

What We've Learned Updated: 27.05:
Since the customer's question wasn't very specific, we informed him about the alerts that can be configured at this moment and we also let him know that what he wants to see and to be alerted about is an admin action for which we do not have the alerts configuration option at this moment.

Next Steps Updated: 27.05:
Awaiting customer's reply after the information has been provided.

What We've Learned Updated: 27.05:
Since the customer's question wasn't very specific, we informed him about the alerts that can be configured at this moment and we also let him know that what he wants to see and to be alerted about is an admin action for which we do not have the alerts configuration option at this moment.
---
We reexplained to the customer the available options: the rights changes can be verified/monitored in Reports and Analysis -> Admin Actions (no notification will be sent) and no alert can be created for that.

28.05:
We confirmed with the customer what can be done to check the right changes for now and we also encouraged him to submit a feature request for what he exactly wanted.
